  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:A Weekend Trip</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörende Strategies:A Wochenende Reise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage D'Écoute de Week-end de Strategies:A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desengate Escutando Do Fim de semana De 
Strategies:A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggio Ascoltante Di Fine settimana Di 
Strategies:A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι Σαββατοκύριακου Strategies:A ακούσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viaje Del Fin de semana De Strategies:A Que 
escucha</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students improve their vocabulary related to a weekend trip, and learn words which they may also encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes some translations to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weekend trips</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische 
Kursteilnehmer ihren Wortschatz verbessern, der auf einer Wochenende 
Reise in Verbindung gestanden wird, und erlernt Wörter, die sie in 
hörenden Erfassenübungen auch antreffen können. Schließt 
einige Übersetzungen zum Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où les étudiants anglais 
améliorent leur vocabulaire lié à un voyage de week-end, et apprend
les mots qu'ils peuvent également rencontrer dans des exercices 
d'écoute de compréhension. Inclut quelques traductions à 
l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses 
melhorem seu vocabulário relacionado a um desengate do fim de semana,
e aprende as palavras que podem também encontrar em exercícios 
escutando da compreensão. Inclui algumas traduções ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi 
inglesi migliorano il loro vocabolario relativo ad un viaggio di fine 
settimana ed impara le parole che possono anche incontrare nelle 
esercitazioni ascoltanti di comprensione. Include alcune 
traduzioni ad ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές βελτιώνουν το λεξιλόγιό τους σχετικό με ένα ταξίδι 
Σαββατοκύριακου, και μαθαίνουν τις λέξεις που μπορούν επίσης να 
αντιμετωπίσουν στις ασκήσεις κατανόησης ακούσματος. 
Περιλαμβάνει μερικές μεταφράσεις στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde los estudiantes
ingleses mejoran su vocabulario relacionado con un viaje del fin de 
semana, y aprende las palabras que pueden también encontrar en 
ejercicios de la comprensión que escuchan. Incluye algunas 
traducciones al hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wochenende Reisen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voyages de week-end</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desengates do fim de semana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">viaggi di fine settimana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταξίδια Σαββατοκύριακου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">viajes del fin de semana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
